description: This Dart file defines a reusable Flutter widget called GlassContainer, which implements a frosted glass effect (glassmorphism) using background blur, semi-transparent tint, optional border and gradient, and touch interactions.

classes.name: GlassContainer
classes.description: A reusable frosted glass container widget with customizable visual effects and tap handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the GlassContainer, applying the frosted glass effect and handling tap events.
